mods.abstract: Image of Dr. Robert S. and Rita Mendelsohn standing in the doorway of a room, looking to the side at one another and smiling. Dr. Mendelsohn is wearing a blue t-shirt with "CAMP 80B-RITA PEOPLE'S VACATION" written on it over top of a dress shirt and tie, and the back of Rita's red t-shirt (which she wears over a plaid blouse) says "DIRECTOR."
mods.accessCondition: Item digitized for access and research purposes only. Copyright retained by Robert S. Mendelsohn Estate. For all other uses, contact archives@yorku.ca.
